inn1.comm: good length ball outside off stump with springy bounce to the keeper after Rahane lets it go
pushed off the front foot towards extra cover and Rahane runs a quick single, good running
good length angling across the left-hander from over the wicket, Gambhir stays in his crease and plays on the off side
short length with width outside off stump, Gambhir cuts towards third man
Rahane closes the face to play towards leg but gets hit on the pad by one that nips back into him from a good length
full delivery rather wide outside off, Rahane reaches for it and drives through the gap between cover and extra cover, didn't hit it hard, just timed it beautifully across this quick outfield
full ball outside off, Gambhir drives fluently but straight to cover, Finn got so close to the stumps while delivering that he hit them with his foot
Gambhir opens the face to steer the ball and plays it rather fine, the ball bounces well short of the cordon and the two slips look at each other as the ball goes between them
defended on the front foot and Rahane calls Gambhir through for another quick single, alert call and quick response
Finn beats the bat with one that bounces from a good length, Rahane tried to play it from the crease
defended on the front foot past the bowler, the fielder at mid-on races in but doesn't pick up cleanly, the fielder from mid-off was providing cover though
played off the hips behind square
short of a length outside off, punched from the crease towards cover point
played off the pads to square leg
good length and straight, pushed off the front foot towards mid-on
full and straight, Rahane seemed to push that so gently but the ball found more legs after it beat the bowler and bisected the gap between mid-on and mid-off
punched off the back foot towards point, the length was shorter this time
defended on the front foot towards mid-on
good length ball on off stump, played towards point from the crease
played from the crease towards point
short of a length outside off, good carry through to the keeper after Gambhir lets it go
played with soft hands on the off side for a quick single
short of a length outside off, played to cover point
short of a length angling into the right-hander, defended from the crease. Finn's keeping the batsmen in their crease
short ball, Gambhir lets it go through to Kieswetter
short of a length with width outside off, Gambhir cuts wide of third man and Meaker should have stopped that with his dive to the left
clipped off the pads behind square leg where Finn dives on the boundary and pulls off the save
defended on the front foot on the off side
good length around off stump, played from the crease towards cover point
defended on the off side once again
Rahane stays in his crease and defends on the offside
length ball angling into the pads, Rahane leans forward and closes the face to tuck it behind square
good length on off stump, Rahane stays put and defends on the off side
defended on the front foot towards mid-on
length ball just outside off stump, Rahane strides forward and pushes it through extra cover and the ball screams across this outfield, Cook chases and dives but fails to pull it in
Bell dives to his left to stop the ball at point after Rahane had played a square drive to a fullish ball
defended on the off side, they think about a risky single but don't go for it
good length outside off, Rahane waits in his crease and guides to third man
short ball, Gambhir begins to fend but then takes his eyes off the ball as it goes past his head
short of a length and straight, Gambhir stays on the back foot and blocks
fuller length and Gambhir drives towards cover and runs
pushed off the front foot towards cover
good length pitching around middle, Gambhir defends on the front foot
good length and straight, defended on the front foot
Gambhir comes down the pitch and moves towards leg side to hit through the off, nearly gets yorked and mis-times the ball towards mid-off
short of a length outside off, opens the face and plays towards third man
full ball outside off, Gambhir leans into the cover drive but can't beat Cook in the infield
defended from the crease towards the off side
played from the crease towards short cover, that drive was mis-timed
Gambhir opens the face and uses the angle across him to steer to third man
full ball around off stump, Rahane leans forward and drives towards extra cover
Rahane chases a wide delivery and tries to drive but gets beaten
full toss, played to short cover
played off the front foot towards midwicket
full ball angling into the right-hander from wide of the crease, flicked through the gap between mid-on and midwicket
defended on the off side
short of a length delivery outside off, rises on Rahane who tries to steer towards third man and gets beaten
good length around off stump, defended on the off side
full ball around off stump, driven firmly but to the fielder at short cover
Rahane moves across and tries to flick a good length ball that crashes into the pad, Finn appeals but that was missing leg stump
driven off the front foot to long-on
aimed at middle stump from over the wicket, Rahane drives to long-off
nudged off the front foot towards point
short of a length and wide outside off, Gambhir stays back and dabs it so late past slip and too fine for short third man
nudged off the pad towards square leg
full ball around off stump, driven off the front foot towards mid-off

dropped, Gambhir wanted to steer it towards third man but he didn't want to steer it that fine! The short of a length ball hit high on the bat. Kieswetter dived too far to his left and the ball went between his hands and his head
defended towards short cover
played towards mid-on where Patel slides to his left and cuts it off
full ball outside off stump, driven towards sweeper
Rahane leans into the square drive and the fielder at point gets some bad bounce which takes the ball past him, the ball skipped up suddenly off the practice pitches
the length is a bit short, which allows Gambhir to go right back and cut the ball from in front of the stumps towards deep point
defended back to the bowler
Gambhir came out of his crease but wasn't to the pitch of the ball, so he adjusted and pushed on the off side
Rahane lunges forward to defend but the ball hits higher on the bat, it stopped on the batsman, and looped up towards the bowler, fell just short of Patel
defended on the leg side
defended on the off side
Gambhir stays in his crease and opens the face to play a short of a length slower ball towards point
steered towards third man
full delivery angling into the pads, Rahane flicks but can't beat midwicket
that's beaten midwicket, a full toss on leg stump and Rahane clipped it off his pads to the fielder in the deep
full ball on middle and leg, driven to mid-on
full ball, this time outside off, driven through cover but the timing isn't great
spin into the left-hander, Gambhir works the ball square off his pads
Rahane comes out of his crease and mis-times the off drive towards midwicket
driven towards mid-off, but Patel moves quickly to his left and fields
Rahane leaps out of his crease to take the ball on the full and lofts it flat over the bowler's head
tossed up on off, Rahane drives on the off side, Patel moves to his left and slides to deflect the ball towards extra cover
played off the front foot towards deep point
played off the front foot towards long-on
flat ball on the pads, Gambhir goes back and plays through square
full ball around off, played with a closed face to midwicket
short ball outside off stump, Rahane goes back and spoons the ball intentionally over the infield at cover and to the boundary
defended on the front foot towards Swann
defended on the front foot towards the off side
good length angling across the left-hander from over the wicket, Gambhir tries to run it to third man with no foot movement and gets beaten
length ball with ample width, Gambhir plays the square drive to deep point
played off the front foot with an open face towards third man
good length on off stump, defended from the crease towards the off side
good length ball but a tad too wide outside off, steered to third man
Rahane reaches for one outside off and tries to steer towards third man, he gets beaten, by a bit of extra pace I think
bowled off the inside edge! Gambhir tried to cut a short of a length ball off the back foot, it was a touch too close to him and he played it on to his stumps
good length around off stump, Kohli gets behind the line and defends
that one kept a bit low on off stump after pitching on a good length, Kohli defended from the crease and hit it with the bottom of his bat
short of a length outside off, Kohli controls the extra bounce and steers towards point
Kohli pushes away from his body at one that bounces quite a bit from short of a length, he gets beaten once again

Kohli hasn't offered a shot and has lost off stump! That ball landed on a good length outside off stump and cut in off the pitch, Kohli moved forward and lifted his bat out of the way, only to the watch the ball come back at him and hit the top of off. It was too full to leave, so Kohli wouldn't have expected that to cut back off the pitch. Double strike from Finn.
short of a length outside off, played towards point
played towards mid-on
good length ball angling into the right-hander, defended towards the bowler

that is some catch! Kieswetter lunges to his right to grab a thick outside edge with one hand! The ball was full from Bresnan and Rahane reached for it and drove away from his body. England have stormed into this match, and how.
good length on off stump, Raina pushes the ball towards cover and runs
good length angling into the right-hander, defended on the leg side
good length on middle and off, Raina defends on the front foot
fuller ball outside off, Raina strides forward and shoulders arms
defended from the crease towards the off side
fuller length outside off, Raina plays off the front foot to mid-off
Raina chases one that slants away from him outside off stump and gets beaten
played from the crease towards cover, a maiden over to end the bowling Powerplay
the slower ball outside off stump, defended on the off side
short of a length outside off, defended towards point
fuller ball angling into the right-hander, defended on the front foot
Tiwary came forward and closed the face too early, getting a bit of a leading edge
Tiwary leans forward and closes the face to play towards midwicket
another maiden over, Tiwary pushes the ball off the front foot to mid-off

dropped, a sitter at second slip. Finn went round the wicket and pounded a good length ball into Raina who pushed away from his body off the front foot. The thick edge flew so easily to Swann and he spilled it
short and wide outside off, Raina cuts it hard over point for a boundary, and right after the drop!
Raina reaches out again and drives uppishly behind point to third man
full ball outside off, Tiwary finally gets going with a square drive past point, Bresnan tries to stop the ball with a sliding football tackle but fails
short of a length just outside off, Tiwary fends and is beaten
good length ball cuts into Tiwary who plays towards square and runs
short of a length ball on the pads, turned in front of square
Bopara bowls a yorker, Raina plays it back to him
played from the crease towards the off side
Raina moves forward and punches a length ball to long-on
played off the front foot through backward point
full ball on the pads and Raina flicks the ball in the air into the gap on the deep midwicket boundary
full ball angling into the pads, played towards midwicket
short of a length outside off, left alone by the batsman
that's a rubbish ball, full and outside leg stump, Tiwary leans across and glances it past the keeper
full delivery with some swing into the right-hander, played to midwicket
full delivery outside off stump, driven off the front foot through point, he leaned forward and opened the face to steer it through the gap
another full ball down leg side, Tiwary lets it go and Kieswetter does well to dive to his left and make the save
flicked off the pads to midwicket
Raina chases one that's wide outside off stump, was slower as well and it beat the bat
punched from his crease past the bowler
there is some swing into the right-hander, Tiwary moves forward and punches on the off side
full ball and Tiwary pushes it gently past Bopara
Raina walks forward and drives a length ball on the up and through cover, places it wide of the fielder in the deep
Raina misses the flick and there's an appeal for lbw, the ball pitched outside leg stump
good length around off stump, Tiwary defends
short of a length outside off, the batsman fends and gets beaten
full ball outside off, Tiwary strides forward and drives through backward point
short of a length outside off, Raina opens the face and plays to third man
Tiwary was looking to play that ball towards midwicket but got a leading edge towards third man
short of a length and straight, Tiwary gets behind the line and blocks
nudged off the front foot towards midwicket
driven back to the bowler off the front foot
played off the back foot towards third man
tossed up outside off, driven to cover
width outside off stump and Tiwary waits and dabs it late past short third man
Tiwary moves forward and drives to long off
short of a length outside off, Tiwary reaches for it without moving his feet and misses
caught behind! Tiwary pushed forward at good length ball that held its line outside off and got a nick through to Kieswetter, easy catch
played towards mid-off
flicked uppishly but through the gap between midwicket and mid-on for four
played from the crease towards cover
left alone outside off stump
tossed up from round the wicket, driven to long off for a single
nudged off the front foot towards midwicket
Dhoni moves forward and across to play towards square
nurdled towards point for a single
Raina punches the ball in the air but past cover towards long-off
Dhoni takes the ball from outside of and paddles towards fine leg
short of a length outside off, Dhoni lets it go
full ball angling into Dhoni who square drives from the crease towards point
short of a length around off stump, Dhoni stays in his crease and plays on the off side
short and wide outside off, Dhoni flashes and the ball flies over point and races to the deep point boundary
Meaker swings a full ball into the right-hander, Dhoni manages to defend
Meaker nips a good length ball into the right-hander and hits Dhoni on the thigh
tossed up from round the wicket, driven down to long off
tries to lap-sweep this from way outside off stump and it lobs into the leg side
dabs this round the corner through short fine leg
on off stump, Raina comes forward and defends
floated up and Raina just pushes gently into the off side where cover is quite deep
too short, too wide, and Dhoni waits on the back foot then cuts through point
starts full on off stump and it's driven to cover
back of a length, Raina drives on the up and it goes in the air for a while but safely to long off
angling in towards middle and leg, pushed back down the pitch by Dhoni
pushed into the leg side and there's a small amount of hesitation in the run but it's all fine for Dhoni
on leg stump and whipped away through square leg with excellent timing and the power to beat deep square
back on middle and off, defended to the bowler
pushed down to long on
over the wicket, nicely bowled, almost done in the flight as he uses his feet
opens the face into the off side
pushed back down the on side, Swann tries to get a boot on it then the ball hits the non-striker
onto the back foot and cracked to cover
taken from outside off and turned to midwicket
driven easily down to long off
touch short, gives Dhoni time to place it through cover off the back foot
tries to glide this through third man and is beaten
onto the back foot and punched to midwicket where Bell makes a good save
dragged down short, driven off the back foot past cover who gets a touch on the ball
pushed into the off side
almost chips a catch to cover as this tops in the surface as Raina pushes at it
fuller this time, Raina comes onto the front foot and defends
on leg stump and driven down the ground
pushed off the back foot towards cover who is quickly onto it
fuller and worked out to midwicket...Dhoni biding his time for the Powerplay
well bowled with some flight and Dhoni defends on the front foot
full and wide outside off, Raina opens the face to glide it to third man
full on middle, defended to the leg side
stays full and Dhoni plays into the off side
goes even fuller and there's a hint of shape into Dhoni who pushes it past the stumps towards mid-on
he's fortune there, gives himself room to carve this through the off side and gets an inside edge past the stumps towards fine leg
dragged short and wide outside and it's too wide for Billy Bowden
that's a lovely delivery but it costs a boundary. Back of a length and it squares up Raina and the edge flies through about third slip. Finn is a frustrated young man
uses his feet straight away, pushed to cover and there's almost a run out as Raina charged up for the single but was sent back. It was a direct hit and Raina needed the dive to be safe
push-and-run into the off side, these two are very quick between the wickets
aims to go through the off side with a big drive but loses his shape and doesn't connect
that's a beauty, just a hint of shape away from Raina and it beats the outside edge

pushed to square leg and it's a direct hit by Bopara. The ball flies to the boundary and now we see the reply. Is Raina's bat in the air? He survived a tight call in the first game. The bails are up and the bat looks to have bounced up as it crossed the line. Tight call. And he's gone! Vital breakthrough for England
full at middle and pushed to mid off
lovely way to start an innings, drives a full delivery square through the off side and bisects the gap at backward point
short on leg stump, turned away through midwicket
slashed away in the air fine of backward point down to third man
outside off and left alone, barely carries to Kieswetter
full outside off, drives with an open face and finds backward point...playing out Finn's last over
takes the outside edge but it's very controlled by Dhoni down to third man
beaten outside off as Dhoni flashes without any footwork
pushed into the off side and cover is too deep to stop the single
well bowled. Beats the outside from round the wicket as Jadeja pushes at a delivery that offers to leave him
close! Driven in the air but just wide of a diving cover and the sweeper cuts off a boundary
worked into the leg side
opens the face into the off side to find a gap between cover and backward point
beats the left hander as he tries to guide it down to third man and it doesn't reach the keeper on the full
on off stump, driven out to cover
straight delivery is whipped away wide of long leg
half an appeal as Jadeja is taken on the pad but it pitched outside leg stump
driven square into the off side and can't beat backward point...two fielders very close together square
doesn't time this properly but it's a fast outfield. Was a bit of a heave across the line but it beat square leg and ran away
heaved out to deep midwicket, but the fielder on the rope is found
speared down from round the wicket, and it's clipped off the pads into the leg side
slapped hard off the back foot, but stopped by a diving extra cover
Dhoni skips down the track and, having not quite got to the pitch, nudges a safe single to leg
Jadeja comes well forward to defend back down the track
flicked away for a single into the deep
flapped down to long on, Jadeja playing with the spin and with plenty of bottom hand
this one rushes straight on with the arm from round the wicket, and is easily clipped through straight midwicket for one
a touch of extra bounce off the surface with this quicker one, and Jadeja can only work it to the man at midwicket
quite flat again, but this time Jadeja's bunt goes down the ground
fiddled into the covers off the front foot
Patel ends a tight over with another quicker one that takes the inside half and rolls to short fine leg, where the fielder is in very quickly to stop the run
looped down on leg stump from round the wicket, Jadeja pressing forward to work a single into the leg side
aggression from Dhoni! He came down the track and smeared this back past the bowler, but Trott did well at long off to cut it off and keep them to two
there's no stopping this one! Again Dhoni uses his feet, but this time sends the ball sailing over Swann's head for a towering six. The first one of the innings
Swann spots Dhoni's shuffle down the track this time and fires down a quicker one that is clipped to midwicket
another massive blow! Dhoni targeted wide long on this time, whipping his wrists across the ball and playing the shot with immense power
driven down the ground for one
flicked wristily out to deep midwicket, and the placement is good enough for them to squeeze in a second run
arrowed down flat and straight, the ball being tapped back to the bowler
Patel slips out a low full toss that is glanced to midwicket

Jadeja falls to a great catch! He ran down at the bowler, who sent the ball down wide of off. Jadeja wasn't quite to the pitch and ended up swiping across the line to send the ball towards midwicket, where a leaping Bell held the stinging chance cleanly
Ashwin is off the mark straight away with a push to long on
Dhoni has to turn and scamper home quickly after tapping this towards cover point and setting off ... He was sent back a little late, and had to hurry
nudged defensively to leg
full and straight from Meaker, attacking the stumps, and Ashwin has to dig it out back down the track
a little short of a good length, and it's turned off the hip for one
this one slips out well wide of off, too wide to be hit
another full, wide delivery. Dhoni throws the bat at it to get it down to third man
a high full toss is fended to midwicket, Ashwin looking a little surprised by the delivery
eased down to long on for a single, Ashwin keeping strike
drilled back at the bowler
shot! This looked like four, until a sliding stop by Tim Bresnan at deep cover hauled it in. Ashwin had sent the ball flying over cover with a scooped drive
chipped into the leg side this time, two more to the total
Ashwin holes out at long off! He used his feet and tried to lift this down the ground, but didn't quite get to the pitch and didn't fully go through with the shot. An easy catch for the fielder
squirted to midwicket off the inside half of the bat, the single taken
pushed backward of square on the off side, two runs taken
tapped to cover, who is on the edge of the circle, and the call for the single is immediate
nudged to point, this time the single is not on offer as he hit it a little too well
swiped over cover! Praveen just stood up at the crease and scythed through the line to lift this over the fielder
a low full toss is driven down to long off
driven out to deep cover for one
Praveen hops to work this into the leg side for one more
Praveen gives himself a little room, but Patel follows him with a quicker one that's pushed back to the bowler
again Praveen steps away, but this time swings a flattish delivery out through square leg
great running from Dhoni. He's a master of manoeuvring the ball around in one-day cricket. He just nudged this to midwicket, not too hard, and placed it well enough to come back for the second
this time he hangs back to pull an arm ball out to deep midwicket, hitting it straight at the fielder
Praveen swipes right across the line and completely misses the ball, but fortunately for him it scoots past leg stump and they take byes
another massive mow from Praveen, this time he toe-ends to midwicket inside the circle, Dhoni wisely turning the single down
a slower one lands quite wide of off, and is chopped down in front of point
slapped down to long on, the bottom hand completely dominating the shot
fifty for Dhoni! And he gets there with a clubbed drive over cover that raced to the boundary. Great shot, and that's his 8th ODI fifty against England
drilled back to the bowler, who gets a hand to it to take some of the power out of the shot, but can't stop them taking two more
Kieswetter fumbles! Meaker had slammed down a very short slower-ball bouncer that ballooned well over Dhoni and then dipped as it approached the keeper, who bent down but couldn't stop the ball
flayed out to deep midwicket, Patel doing well to save runs on the boundary
scooped over wide long on! Dhoni knew exactly what he wanted to do with this half volley, lifting it effortlessly over the boundary
smashed over midwicket! Praveen has full licence to go on the charge now, and does so in fine style, running down at the left-arm spinner and crashing him over the leg side field

but now he perishes in the pursuit of another boundary. This was perhaps a little shorter and flatter from Patel, and Praveen was cramped for room as he targeted the leg side again. He could only get the ball as far as Bairstow, who took a well-judged catch at long on
drilled down the ground to long off, Vinay Kumar really has to hurry back for the second and even gets the dive out
a mis-hit flies over cover, Dhoni having sliced the bat under the ball ... but it falls safely!
yet another six for Dhoni! He collects his fourth maximum with a nonchalant shuffle and pick-up down the ground
shorter and quicker, and Dhoni finds two runs from the final delivery with a flat-batted pull out to deep midwicket

inn2.comm: nice start, back of a length outside off, shapes back to Kieswetter who defends
swings away this time and it's left alone
starts outside off and shapes back into the right hander as he leaves alone
uses his feet and comes at Praveen then the ball slips down the leg side
down the pitch again, taken on the pad and there's a strangled appeal but it was nowhere ner
lovely stuff from Praveen, he beats the outside edge with one that shapes away as Kieswetter poked at it
probing away outside off and left alone...nice start from Praveen
turned neatly off middle and leg in front of square
gets outside off, Cook comes onto the front foot and defends
comes slightly across the crease and defends to mid-on
brilliant fielding - India have been excellent all series - as Tiwary pulls of a super save at backward point after Cook middled a cut shot
comes onto the front foot and drives to mid-off...India would probably have dropped that for a single
outside off, driven to mid-off
much better from Kieswetter, this wasn't a half volley and he just leant on it between cover and mid-off
back of a length, swings back into Kieswetter who pushes to long on which has been dropped to the boundary
tucked off middle stump to the left of mid on
pushed from off stump down to long on and they walk the single
more super fielding by Tiwary at point. Praveen had come round the wicket, Cook thumped away another cut but couldn't beat the field
pushed back to the bowler
tight line on off stump, and that's better running from England as Kieswetter pushed it short of mid-off
worked away from off stump through square leg
this time he pierces the off side with a cover drive that beats a diving mid off
touch shorter and Cook late cuts down to third man
clips the pad and there's a hearty appeal but it never looked right...going well down the leg side
that's why Kieswetter is selected, he steps outside leg and takes a stride down the pitch then launches a drive over long off
comes onto the front foot and drives to the right of mid off
a bad ball is put away, big full toss around leg stump and it's easily flicked away to the vacant fine leg
fuller outside off, he goes for a drive and it skews off an inside edge into the leg side
full on middle and off, pushed firmly back to Praveen who then shapes to throw which gets the crowd excited
that's a nicely-timed drive but it's straight enough to allow Praveen to clutch it in his follow through. Swift work from the bowler
flashes and misses outside off as he tries another cut
full on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
hint of width but Kieswetter doesn't time his drive into the covers
touch short, Kieswetter pushes forward and gets an inside edge towards square leg
flicked sweetly but straight to midwicket
well timed and well placed, Cook drives and beats mid off for a second time
this is a touch short and Cook waits on the back foot but picks out point with his cut
just blocks this down the ground to long on
punched off the back foot straight down the pitch...silly mid-off and the bowler nearly collide
he drives again but the bat twists on the shot so it isn't timed between cover and mid off
well bowled, a slower ball which grips and causes Kieswetter trouble as it bounces and takes the outside edge which falls short of slip
tucked into the square-leg area and they run hard to make a second out of it
back of a length, worked through midwicket this time and it's another brace
starts outside leg stump and worked out to deep square
pushed from leg stump to midwicket
outside off stump, comes onto the front foot and defends
ooh, big appeal for lbw and that looked quite close as Kieswetter went for the sweep but it struck him outside the line of off stump
worked out to deep square
a ripper! This one grips and spins past Cook's outside edge as he plays forward
driven firmly to mid off
offered some width and Kieswetter doesn't hold anything back as he cuts it hard through backward point
worked off leg stump through midwicket
drifts onto leg stump and that's a lovely piece of timing from Cook as it flicks it through square leg
plays forward and drives towards mid off who is now fairly deep
invention from Kieswetter as he goes down on one knee then scoops this over where short fine-leg would have been
quicker ball on middle stump, defended back to the bowler
oops! Cook gets a top edge on a sweep but it falls short of deep square-leg then Varun Aaron is beaten by the spin which sends the ball through his legs
worked off the back foot through midwicket
plays back and defends
powerful sweep but he picks out square leg
the same fielder in action again as Kieswetter tucks this off the stumps
well, there's spin for him, but he lands the legbreak down the leg side and that's wide
A touch too straight again from Tiwary, but he's not overly punished as Cook clips to square leg
but this time he is! Another leg side delivery, and this time it's cracked behind square for four
pushed defensively to leg, and Cook finds enough space for a single
Kieswetter collects four with a whippy cut to backward point. Tiwary had offered width outside off
yet more width outside off, but this time Kieswetter chops it to deep cover
worked with the spin through midwicket for a couple
turned off the pads, the midwicket fielder inside the ring diving to no avail
a premeditated paddle sweep is hit well enough for a single to be taken as the fielder runs in from long leg
Kieswetter milks a single through midwicket
the delivery pitches and spins away from Cook, who cuts but finds the fielder
another flashing cut from Cook, but the same fielder is pinged
Cook is down on bended knee waiting for this as it arrives, and dabs another sweep down to fine leg
pushed down quite flat on middle and off, Cook defends to leg
swept out to deep square, where there's cover
driven uppishly down to long off, the ball dropping well in front of the fielder
whipped off the toes through midwicket
nicely flighted by Jadeja, the ball landing on an off stump line. Kieswetter stretches forward in defence
and solid front foot defence to end the over
Cook angles the bat on the drive to place it past extra cover
a quicker carrom ball is speared down on middle, drawing Kieswetter's defence
appreciable spin for Ashwin as Kieswetter goes back and across to cut. He's cramped for room and can only send the ball to cover
turned off the pads and down to fine leg for one
looped up really high by Ashwin. The ball arrives as a full toss, but Cook can only tap it to midwicket
Ashwin comes round the wicket, Kieswetter's clip being intercepted at midwicket
Cook shuffles right across to off to play a powerful sweep to deep square
Kieswetter pushes forward with bat and pad right together to defend
shot! Kieswetter skipped down and sent the ball racing to wide long off with a shovelled drive
quicker and flatter through the air, and he's tucked to square leg for one
eased into the leg side, and they take an ambled single. These two are milking the bowling really well
a nice little shot from Kieswetter - a deft late cut - but it's stopped at short third man
Cook comes well forward and plays for the turn, pushing the bat slightly away from the body to run the ball to backward point
there's rather more intent in this shot as he chops one to extra cover
an attempted sweep from Cook, but he plays over the top of it and is hit on the body
this one rushes straight on and keeps a little low, but Cook jabs the bat down in good time and gets a single to long on
flicked into the gap at square leg, one more to the total
shot! Too short and too wide from Ashwin, and Cook dispatched it to the cover boundary with a forcing stroke off the back foot. The ground falls silent ...
slapped to cover point! Kieswetter goes to fifty in style. It was a poor loosener from Aaron, wide outside off, and the batsman got a great connection on the cut
that's better from the bowler, pitching it up a little more and aiming at the off stump
punched firmly out to the cover sweeper off the back foot
tapped tamely through mid off for an ambled single
fired in full and fast by Aaron, Kieswetter digging the drive out to mid off
Kieswetter stands at the crease and tries to drive on the up, but finds the fielder inside the circle at cover
paddle-swept quite fine to fine leg ... but they decide against the second
left alone by Kieswetter ... He had bent right down and set himself to sweep but Jadeja spotted him and fired it down wide, Kieswetter pulling out of the stroke
lofted to wide long off! A good cricket shot from Kieswetter, making room and placing it wide of the long off fielder
edged! Kieswetter presses forward and gets a thick edge that flies past Dhoni and a diving Raina at slip. That was a tough chance, but not uncatchable
turn and bounce! This really spat off the surface, bursting past Kieswetter's defence and through Dhoni's gloves
nicely flighted to end the over, and Kieswetter defends back down the track
Cook is beaten by some pace and bounce immediately after the interval, but manages to get something on the fend and sprints through for one to go to fifty
beaten by a rising delivery outside off! Aaron invited the stroke by banging it in short and wide, but Kieswetter couldn't connect with the upper cut
bunted down to long on for a single
cut away imperiously. Cook really does prefer pace on the ball, and also doesn't mind a bit of width outside off! Backward point and third man are bisected by the stroke
flicked off the hip down to fine leg
a good end to a slightly loose over from Aaron, who keeps Kieswetter quiet with a length delivery on off stump
a top-edged reverse sweep, but Dhoni can't get to it! He made a good effort, sprinting back and diving, but it plopped down in front of him
turned with the spin into the leg side, but square leg runs across to cut it off quickly
flicked to midwicket, straight to the fielder

beaten in the flight! Kieswetter was setting himself for a sweep, but it was much too full to the shot and at the last moment he tried to shift into a forward defence but the ball slipped right under the bat and past Dhoni
swept hard, straight to square leg
leading edge! But it flies well wide of Jadeja and down to long off
and another boundary, Aaron drops short and Cook swivels on a pull shot that sends the ball to long leg...the bowler not happy
done him! The change works and India have their breakthrough. Cook was caught on the crease and the ball squeezed past the inside edge to take off stump. It may also have kept a fraction low
he's greeted by a very high bouncer that makes Dhoni leap and is called wide
full on off stump, driven sweetly into the off side and almost a huge mix-up in the running. Trott wanted one but Kieswetter didn't
drags this a little wide and Trott sends it out to the cover sweeper
full and wide outside, driven to cover
a very firm drive by Kieswetter but goes straight to cover
whipped to mid on
driven off a thick inside edge which goes through the leg side and deep square can't stop a second
driven down to long off
gone! Double strike for India. They are back in the game. Kieswetter is beaten by an arm ball and there was little doubt about that. Hitting middle half-way up
on off stump, comes forward and defends
goes down very early and sweeps a low full toss to deep square
full on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
was this a drop? Bell went to force it off the back foot but don't think he made contact
worked out to deep square leg
sharp turn and Trott aims to play through the off side but the ball dribbles to leg
that's a better shot, gets over the line of the ball and works down the ground
and another! The innings is losing its way as Bell gets a thin edge through to Dhoni as he played off the back foot.
more turn! This grips and spins from middle and off to beat Trott's outside edge
onto the front foot and defends to cover
it's four! This is now a proper collapse. Beautiful bowling from Jadeja as he tossed it up to lure the drive, which Trott obliges by playing and gets a edge to slip
worked off the back foot through square leg
full at Bopara's feet, driven to mid off
big appeal this is taken down the leg side by Dhoni but Bowden not interested
defended off the back foot
comes forward this time and gets an inside edge into the pad that loops to the on side
uses his feet and sends this to long on
round the wicket, tucked off the pads to short fine-leg who makes an excellent save. India buzzing now
nicely bowled, the carrom ball on off stump and Bairstow defends
dabbed into the off side
driven into the off side
steps back and drives square off the back foot
this one doesn't bounce as much as it's jabbed into the covers
nice flight and it's pushed out to deep cover
the game of skittles continues! Bairstow didn't really have a clue. He tried to go over the leg side, against the turn, and gets a thick outside edge that loops to backward point
opens the face off the back foot and finds point
what ripper! That was ragged back from outside of and spun between a lunging forward push from Bopara
defended to the on side
whipped from outside off and Ashwin makes a good save
round the wicket, pushed off the back foot into the leg side
spins again, takes the pad towards leg slip
now the risky runs are coming out, that's pressure, as this is pushed into the off side and there's hesitation. Dhoni sprints from behind the stumps and a direct hit would have been close
tossed up on off stump, driven in the air through the covers
driven down to long off
lovely shot, tossed up full and wide which gives Patel the chance to unfurl a strong cover drive
not as full this time and it's defended
pushed into the leg side
direct hit! This will be close but Bopara has got his bat across the line (or, rather, placed it over the line) just in time. Excellent throw from Jadeja
pushed into the leg side
flat and straight, can't beat midwicket
pushed down the leg side
round the wicket and very full, dug out back to the bowler
pushed into the leg side and another excellent stop by Kohli at midwicket
thumps this down to long on
down the leg side, an appeal for a catch but not out and no wide given either. Must have clipped the pad
tossed very wide of the off stump
back on line, pushed back to the bowler
given plenty of flight, Patel responds with a booming drive and is beaten by sharp spin
that was ugly from Patel, a hack outside off stump and he misses
driven off the back foot to cover
cut away square out to the cover sweeper
played off the back foot to cover
nudged into the leg side
Patel swipes lustily across the line to send the ball rolling out to deep midwicket
tapped back to the bowler

there goes another one! An odd shot from Bopara. He got right across to off stump and set himself for a big sweep, even as Raina trundled in from round the wicket. Ball zipped past bat and clattered into leg stump to spark Indian celebrations
pushed quietly back to the bowler
drilled back rather harder this time, but Raina gets down and across to stop the shot again
Patel presses forward in defence
floated up really, really high by Tiwary, but Patel's drive is stopped at extra cover
driven out to the cover sweeper
floated up very full, Bresnan digs it out to backward point

chipped straight to the man at cover! This was a really harmless delivery from the part-time legspinner, and all Bresnan could do was chip it straight to Raina. An awful shot, and India inch closer to the series whitewash
nervous, prodding defence to end the over
slung down round-arm from round the wicket, and Patel slashes a cut out into the deep
Swann comes forward to drive gently to cover
nudged back to the bowler, who threatens to flick the ball back onto the non-striker's stumps
Swann is forward once again, and his drive is stopped at extra cover
worked off the pads to midwicket, but no single to be had
nudged back to the bowler to end another good over for India
Tiwary continues to loop them down very temptingly, and Patel's drive goes straight to cover
inside edge on the drive! Patel tried to blast this through cover but could only inside edge it back onto his boot
slapped firmly into the covers once more
chipped up and over cover, but there's a fielder out so just the single
swept hard, and the fielder dives over the top of it at fine leg to allow the boundary
a chopped cut bounces into the covers
Patel skips down but Raina spots him coming and fires it down quicker, drawing hurried defence
picked up to wide long on! Patel is still fighting for England. He comes down the track and lofts one with good timing and placement
a touch of grip off the surface for Raina, enough to beat Patel's swish to leg and strike him on the pad
punched through cover off the back foot
knocked back down the track to the bowler
flat and full from Raina, and Swann misses a glance to leg. He's struck on the pad, but the ball had landed well outside leg
got him! Wonderful bowling from Jadeja. He ripped this one pretty hard, it gripped and zipped off the surface to bounce and touch Patel's glove on the way through to Dhoni
more spin and bounce! And Meaker is well and truly beaten, poking forward
beaten once again, playing a nothing shot outside off
nudged defensively away into the leg side
turned away for a single this time
Swann will go down swinging! He skips down the track and deposits one over long on
the ball spins past Meaker's inside edge to strike him on the thigh
again Meaker misses the glance to leg, this time to a quicker ball, and is struck in front. There's a huge appeal, and he's sent on his way!
Finn lunges forward in defence
Finn fails to read the variation, and is struck high on the pad
chipped high in the air down the ground ... and far enough to beat the fielder, but not quite far enough for the boundary
there we go, end of the match and the clean sweep for England. Finn sweeps across the carrom ball and the top edge loops straight up to be easily taken by Dhoni
